page.title: 09MORE GAMES CHILDREN PLAY
page.content: {BULLDOGS} For bulldogs you need either 5 or 6 people.One child is the bulldog.You draw a straight line on the ground.The child (bulldog) goes to one side of the line and the other children go to the opposite side.The aim of the game is to get the opposite side without the bulldog catching anyone. {OLIVER TWIST} Oliver Twist is a ball game.A person goes to the wall and throws the ball singing this poem:- Oliver Twist,can you do this?,if so do so,plainses,clappies,round to the backsies,high ball low ball,undie ball,touch the wall,XOX.And then you start again but you clap before you catch the ball.Your out when you drop the ball.
